skillTree.localised_description: There are none more adept at metal-shaping than those who command the runes.
All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Speed"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Speed"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Oath & Steel"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Oath & Steel"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Wrath & Ruin"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Wrath & Ruin"

skillTree.localised_description: The Dwarfs' natural anti-magic resistance is amplified to dampen the Winds of Magic.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -8
	(local region)
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Slowness"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Slowness"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Breaking"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Breaking"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Negation"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Negation"

skillTree.localised_description: Invoking the Rune of Hearth & Home stirs a Dwarf's pride in his Hold, Clan and Ancestors.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Dawi Rune Magic is potent, and damned hard to defend against!
A Runesmith may "strike the runes" - an analogy for keeping them "hot", refusing to let them cool.

effects.description: Shared cooldown: -10% for all Rune Magic

skillTree.localised_description: Blending magic and metalwork, the Runesmith hones armour with greater solidity than items wrought by any other mortal race in the world.

effects.description: Harden Armour action: armour is increased by an additional 3
Harden Armour action: armour is increased by an additional 5

skillTree.localised_description: Perhaps by some gift of Grungni, when a Runesmith feels the rage of battle his throng’s weapons glow with the heat of the forgefires.

effects.description: Sharpen Weapons action: missile and melee damage is increased by an additional 3%
Sharpen Weapons action: missile and melee damage is increased by an additional 5%

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This brave Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grimnir, the Warrior-God.
This industrious Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grungni, God of Mines and Smiths.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -15% for all buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This loyal Dawi can trace his lineage back to Valaya, Goddess of Healing and Protection.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.
Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
